page.title: 19OPINIONS ABOUT WALDERSLADE
page.content: {2.HOW LONG HAVE YOU HAVE LIVED HERE? Less than a year.......... 8 More than a year but less than 5 years...... 7 Between 5-10 years.......16 Between 10-20 years.......17 More than 20 years.......13 We decided people seemed to stay in the area once they came here as 46 out of 61 had lived here 5-20+years. As most of the houses are less than 30yrs old they couldn'live here much longer so it looks as if they like it. To make sure we asked: {3.DO YOU LIKE LIVING IN WALDERSLADE? } Very much.................18 Quite a lot...............12 It's o.k. ................14 Not very much.............09 Not at all................08 We're right,they(44 out of 61) and 16 from other places like Walderslade.
